SELECT r.owner, r.name, r.created_time as createdTime, r.display_name as displayName, r.description FROM ${databaseName}.`role` r WHERE r.is_enabled = 1
AND r.owner = #{owner}
AND ( r.display_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR r.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY r.created_time DESC LIMIT 1000
